targetId.description: Ensembl gene ID for the gene product.
targetId.title: targetId

datasourceId.description: Identifier of the data source providing the expression data.
datasourceId.title: datasourceId

datatypeId.description: Identifier of the data type technology, e.g. RNA-seq, microarray.
datatypeId.title: datatypeId

tissueBiosampleId.description: UBERON ID for the tissue or biosample.
tissueBiosampleId.title: tissueBiosampleId

celltypeBiosampleId.description: CL ID for the cell type.
celltypeBiosampleId.title: celltypeBiosampleId

tissueBiosampleFromSource.description: Name(s) of the tissue or biosample as defined by the source. Comma-separated if multiple.
tissueBiosampleFromSource.title: tissueBiosampleFromSource

celltypeBiosampleFromSource.description: Name(s) of the cell type as defined by the source. Comma-separated if multiple.
celltypeBiosampleFromSource.title: celltypeBiosampleFromSource

targetFromSource.description: Gene symbol, UniProt ID, or other identifier for the target as provided by the data source.
targetFromSource.title: targetFromSourceId

expression.description: Expression value for this single sample.
expression.title: expression

donorId.description: Identifier for the individual sample or bulk assay.
donorId.title: donorId

cellCount.description: Number of cells that contributed to the pseudobulk expression value (required if datatypeId is scrna-seq).
cellCount.title: cellCount

ethnicity.description: Reported ethnicity of the sample donor.
ethnicity.title: ethnicity
